info.title: FullContact Company API
info.description: The API for managing FullContact Companys

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: This API key is assigned to you by FullContact. It is used to identify and authorize your request. Your API key should be kept private, and should never be displayed publicly.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If specified, the response will be wrapped as JSONP in a function call.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain of the company being looked up. For example, fullcontact.com.

parameters.name: keyPeople
parameters.description: If true, a list of Executive and VP level employees at this company will be returned under the keyPeople field.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.description: The prettyPrint parameter can be used to disable prettyprint formatting on the API response.
